forum.content:
The hardest person to forgive is yourself.
最難原諒的人往往不是別人，而是自己。

Just because you know my name does not mean you know my life. Just because you've heard a rumor does not make it true.
你聽說過我，不代表你了解我。你聽過一些流言，不代表就是真的。

Sometimes letting go isn't about giving up. It's about accepting that there are some things that cannot be.
有時候，放下並不等於放棄。有時候，這只是意味著你開始接受，有些事情是不能改變的。

Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love and to work and to play and to look up at the stars.
感恩生命吧，因為這樣你才有機會去愛，去做事情，去玩耍，去仰望星空。

Beauty is to fight for rather than to wait for.
只有拼出來的美麗，沒有等出來的輝煌。




希望可以幫助傷者

雖然我也還沒走出來…😂😂😂
forum.title: 對自己好一點
